titleStmt.title: A discourse of the two covenants wherein the nature, differences, and effects of the covenant of works and of grace are distinctly, rationally, spiritually and practically discussed : together with a considerable quantity of practical cases dependent thereon / by William Strong.
titleStmt.author: Strong, William, d. 1654.
Gale, Theophilus, 1628-1678.
